text: oru manuṣyannuṁ allāhu yāteānnuṁ avatarippiccukeāṭuttiṭṭilla ennu paṟañña sandarbhattil allāhuve vilayiruttēṇṭa muṟaprakāraṁ vilayiruttātirikkukayāṇ avar ceytat‌. paṟayuka: ennāl satyaprakāśamāyikkeāṇṭuṁ, manuṣyarkk mārgadarśakamāyikkeāṇṭuṁ mūsā keāṇṭu vanna granthaṁ ārāṇ avatarippiccat ? niṅṅaḷ atine kaṭalās tuṇṭukaḷākki cila bhāgaṅṅaḷ veḷippeṭuttukayuṁ, (maṟṟu) palatuṁ oḷicc vekkukayuṁ ceyyunnuṇṭallēā. niṅṅaḷkkēā niṅṅaḷuṭe pitākkanmārkkēā aṟivillātirunna palatuṁ (ā granthattilūṭe) niṅṅaḷ paṭhippikkappeṭṭiṭṭumuṇṭ‌. allāhuvāṇ (at avatarippiccat‌) enn paṟayuka. pinnīṭ avaruṭe kutarkkaṅṅaḷumāyi viḷayāṭuvān avare viṭṭēkkuka
